name: Crobia: Enter the Petridome
description:
** Currently for Windows only **

Despite a history of constant warfare, the great tribes of Humans, Orcs, Elves, etc. united to form the nation of Crobia. 

Eons of peace brought upon the technology to shrink living matter!

However, old habits die hard... an innate bloodlust still exists in their DNA. 

Thus, champions are shrunk to a microbial level to engage in murderous sports for entertainment.

Enter the Petridome! Here, you and 3 others will battle against the opposing team as either warriors or archers. 

Each game mode has multiple ways to win. Green portals teleport power-ups as well as dangerous microbes into the arena. 

This game supports up to 8 players locally. If you don't have 7 friends, that's okay! The Petridome will support your team by providing you with microscopic robot AI units to fight.  

*******

Note to players: Due to a Windows limitation, only a maximum of 4 xbox 360/xbox one controllers may be used at the same time. To get around this limitation, it is recommended using a combination of xbox controllers and ps4 controllers. At this time, the game is only supported locally, we at EV.Unit understand the difficulty of getting 8 players in the same room. We aim to have this game available for play online with all your friends and family!

Controllers currently supported:

Xbox 360/Xbox One

Playstation 4 Dualshock

Install notes:

1. Unzip 'Crobia Enter the Petridome v0.112819.zip'

2. Run 'Crobia Enter the Petridome.exe' to play the game

3. Have fun!
